document_data.name: Syndicate of Celestial and Righteous Lawmakers
document_data.orgname: the Syndicate of Celestial and Righteous Lawmakers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Syndicate of Celestial and Righteous Lawmakers''' was an association of warriors and [[paladin]]s devoted to [[Amaunator]], the Keeper of the Eternal Sun, because of his influence over law.
document_data.Organization: The Syndicate had 70 members as of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, the vast majority of whom were paladins.
document_data.Activities: Members of this group infused the outward face of their [[shield]]s with ''[[continual light]]'' to blind those opposed to the law.
